content.description: Very Quick 2 bolt route. Jugs. Worth doing if you're already at Futthead but wouldn't travel just for this route. Officially listed as a 5.8 but I'd call it a 5.7 or 5.8-.
content.location: Middle of the South West Face of Futhead Rock. 10 ft to the right of the Arête.

content.description: Great bolted route up the North West Arête of Futthead
Three bolts up a buttress. First bolt is a ways up.
content.protection: 3 bolts. Bolted anchor on top. Rappel rings on West side of rock.
content.location: Just to the right of the Futthead crack

content.description: There is no pro before the first bolt and it's about 6-8 feet left of the start. From the first bolt head straight up on good holds past three more bolts.
content.protection:
4 bolts to a two bolt anchor.

Descent: From the top you have to downclimb/jump to the other half of Futthead Rock in order to reach the rap station. It's about a 6 foot drop from the top of Child's Walk and Var. to the top of Desert Sensation "next door," but both tops are flat.
content.location: This is the second route on the left of Futthead. The light brown bolts are hard to see at first. Start from the top of a boulder leaning against Futthead and traverse left.

content.description: Traverse left across the bottom portion of the rock until you get past the second bolt, then head up and left past two more bolts and the summit.
content.protection:
4 bolts to a two bolt anchor.

Descent: From the top you have to downclimb/jump to the other half of Futthead Rock in order to reach the rap station. It's about a 6 foot drop from the top of Child's Walk and Var. to the top of Desert Sensation "next door," but both tops are flat.
content.location: This is the first route on the left of Futthead. The light brown bolts are hard to see at first. Start from the top of a boulder leaning against Futthead and traverse left.
